name: Swordnaping
description:
This the 3D project me and two colleagues of mine - Bruno Curado the programmer and Catarina Santos the concept artist and me the 3D artist - It's based around the legend of King Arthur.

In this game you control Merlin who is looking for the sword Excalibur which was stolen by the enchantress Morgan Le Fay by using his power to complete each level and retrieve the sword.
